entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Inukjuak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:39 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -32.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Inukjuak Airport 4:00 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -32.7°C
Pressure: 100.8 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -47
Dewpoint: -36.2°C
Wind: N 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h near midnight. Low minus 35. Wind chill near minus 52. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:24 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 27.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 30 km/h. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 52 in the morning and minus 37 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:24 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 36.
